languages.text: {n}Кассия благодарно кивает.{/n} "Я покину вас на время обряда. Прошу, не следуйте за мной — мало кто способен пережить взгляд моего отверстого ока".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия благодарно кивает.{/n} "Я покину вас на время обряда. Прошу, не следуйте за мной — мало кто способен пережить взгляд моего отверстого ока".

languages.text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия благодарно кивает.{/n} "Я покину вас на время обряда. Прошу, не следуйте за мной — мало кто способен пережить взгляд моего отверстого ока".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."
{n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."
{n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."
{n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅点点头，表示感谢。{/n}“仪式进行期间，我会一个人呆着。我请求你不要跟着我来，因为当我睁开亚空间之眼时，几乎没人能在我的凝视下幸存。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅点点头，表示感谢。{/n}“仪式进行期间，我会一个人呆着。我请求你不要跟着我来，因为当我睁开亚空间之眼时，几乎没人能在我的凝视下幸存。”

languages.text: {n}カシアは感謝の気持ちを込めて頷いた。{/n}「儀式の間、陛下とはお別れです。あたくしの後をついてこないように…<歪み>の目が開かれた時の視線に耐えられるものは、ほとんどいません」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは感謝の気持ちを込めて頷いた。{/n}「儀式の間、あなたとはお別れです。私の後をついてこないように…歪みの目が開かれた時の視線に耐えられるものは、ほとんどいません」
{n}カシアは感謝の気持ちを込めて頷いた。{/n}「儀式の間、陛下とはお別れです。あたくしの後をついてこないように…<歪み>の目が開かれた時の視線に耐えられるものは、ほとんどいません」

languages.text: {n}Cassia nickt dankbar.{/n} "Ich darf mich für die Dauer des Rituals von Euch verabschieden. Bitte folgt mir nicht – nur wenige überleben den Blick meines Warpauges, wenn es geöffnet ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia nickt dankbar.{/n} "Ich darf mich für die Dauer des Rituals von Euch verabschieden. Bitte folgt mir nicht – nur wenige überleben den Blick meines Warpauges, wenn es geöffnet ist."

languages.text: {n}Cassia acquiesce en signe de remerciement.{/n} « Je vais devoir vous laisser pour procéder au rituel. Je vous demanderai de ne pas me suivre, peu de gens sont capables de survivre au regard de mon œil du Warp lorsqu'il est ouvert. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia acquiesce en signe de remerciement.{/n} « Je vais devoir vous laisser pour procéder au rituel. Je vous demanderai de ne pas me suivre, peu de gens sont capables de survivre au regard de mon œil du Warp lorsqu'il est ouvert. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia asiente, agradecida.{/n} «Me ausentaré durante el rito. Le ruego que no me siga, pues hay pocos que sobrevivan a mi ojo de disformidad cuando lo abro».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia asiente, agradecida.{/n} «Me ausentaré durante el rito. Le ruego que no me siga, pues hay pocos que sobrevivan a mi ojo de disformidad cuando lo abro».

languages.text: {n}Cassia teşekkür manasında başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ayin süresince müsaadeni istiyorum. Lütfen beni izleme zira açıldığında Öte Gözümün bakışlarına maruz kalıp da sağ kalanların sayısı pek azdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia nods in thanks.{/n} "I shall take my leave of you for the duration of the rite. I ask that you do not follow me — few can survive the gaze of my Warp Eye when it is opened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia teşekkür manasında başını eğiyor.{/n} "Ayin süresince müsaadeni istiyorum. Lütfen beni izleme zira açıldığında Öte Göz'ümün bakışlarına maruz kalıp da sağ kalanların sayısı pek azdır."
